name: zendframework/zend-json
description: provides convenience methods for serializing native PHP to JSON and decoding JSON to native PHP

suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Zend\Http component, required to use Zend\Json\Server
suggest.zendframework/zend-server: Zend\Server component, required to use Zend\Json\Server
suggest.zendframework/zend-stdlib: Zend\Stdlib component, for use with caching Zend\Json\Server responses
